titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Thomas Shadwell, Esq. late Poet-Laureat, and Historiographer-Royal, who was interred at Chelsea, November 24, 1692 by Nicholas Brady ...
titleStmt.author: Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.

notesStmt.note: "Published at the earnest request of the friends of the deceased."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
